torsional_beam_coordinate_system.png.description: Cylindrical beam showing torsional loading with moment Mz applied at ends and coordinate system with x, y, z axes

beam_cross_section_rotation.png.description: Beam cross-section showing rotation angle theta and coordinate system for torsional displacement analysis

beam_warping_deformation.png.description: Two views of beam showing warping behavior before and after deformation with moment Mz in yz plane

circular_section_shear_stress.png.description: Circular cross-section showing shear stress components at point P with angle theta and coordinate system

section_profiles_shear_flow.png.description: Three rectangular cross-sections showing internal moment Mz and shear flow patterns for open and closed sections

open_closed_section_comparison.png.description: Three cross-sectional profiles showing shear flow direction with arrows for open and closed sections under torsion

rectangular_sections_shear_arms.png.description: Two rectangular cross-sections showing shear flow patterns and arm dimensions for open and closed profiles

generic_section_boundary_integration.png.description: Generic cross-section with boundary regions showing integration area and shear flow analysis

open_section_flow_direction.png.description: Open rectangular section showing directional arrows for shear stress flow analysis

narrow_strip_torsion.png.description: Narrow strip beam subjected to torsional moment Mz showing qualitative shear flow analysis

rectangular_beam_shear_distribution.png.description: Rectangular beam cross-section showing shear stress distribution along thickness with vertical flow at ends

variable_thickness_beam.png.description: Variable thickness beam cross-section showing thickness function b(x) along length a

beam_section_stress_distribution.png.description: Rectangular beam section showing shear stress distribution with dimension labels

narrow_strips_assembly.png.description: Assembly of narrow strips showing generic open section shapes analyzed as combination of rectangular elements

curved_beam_torsion_problem.png.description: Curved beam structure with torsional moment Mz showing SAE section and length dimensions

wing_profile_variable_thickness.png.description: Wing profile cross-section with variable thickness showing parabolic shape function b(x)

c_channel_torsion.png.description: C-channel cross-section with dimensions showing torsional moment Mz application

elliptical_closed_section.png.description: Closed thin-walled elliptical cross-section showing torsional moment Mz and qualitative shear flow behavior

elliptical_section_flow_paths.png.description: Closed elliptical section showing boundary regions and shear flow integration paths with moment Mz

generic_closed_section_midline.png.description: Generic closed cross-section showing shear flow q tangent to midline with radius function r(s) from pole O

bredt_formula_geometry.png.description: Closed section showing triangular element with radius r(s) and area calculation for Bredt formula derivation

circular_tubes_open_closed.png.description: Two circular tubes with thickness t and diameter D showing open and closed configurations for torsional comparison
